CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Action__c) ,"OCC Form 3", "Qualified" ,"OCC Form 4", "Gained Access" ,"Flex Login Completed", "Verbal Commit" ,"Onboarding Completed", "Sold - Submitted" ,"Submit Completed", "Sold - Submitted" ,"First Payroll Run","Sold - Started" ,"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The stage of the opportunity based on the action
CustomField.label: Opp Stage
